mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(upload_date, 'MM/DD') AS uploadDate, COUNT(DECODE(u1, 1, 1)) AS u1, COUNT(DECODE(u2, 1, 1)) AS u2 FROM upload_image WHERE TO_CHAR(upload_date, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{uploadDate}), 'MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(upload_date, 'MM/DD') ORDER BY uploadDate
SELECT COUNT(DECODE(u1, 1, 1)) AS u1, COUNT(DECODE(u2, 1, 1)) AS u2 FROM upload_image

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT TT1.rnum AS num, TT1.category, TT1.name, TT1.url FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, T1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM upload_image WHERE category = #{category} AND checked = 0 ORDER BY upload_date DESC )T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + #{pageSize} )TT1 WHERE rnum >= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + 1 )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM upload_image WHERE category = #{category} AND checked = 0 )B

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT TT1.rnum AS num, TT1.category, TT1.name, TT1.url FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, T1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM upload_image WHERE category in (10, 20, 30) AND checked = 0 ORDER BY upload_date DESC )T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + #{pageSize} )TT1 WHERE rnum >= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + 1 )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM upload_image WHERE category in (10, 20, 30) AND checked = 0 )B
SELECT idx, id, category, TO_CHAR(upload_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS uploadDate, name, url, file_size AS fileSize, checked, u1, u2 FROM upload_image WHERE name = #{name}
mapper.update: UPDATE upload_image SET url = #{url}, category = #{category}, checked = #{checked}, u1 = #{u1}, u2 = #{u2} WHERE name = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upload_image ( idx, id, category, upload_date, name, url, file_size, checked ) VALUES ( upload_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, 10, SYSDATE, #{name}, #{url}, #{fileSize}, 0 )
